Package com.rift.coad.daemon.desktop

Interface Summary
Desktop This interface provide a means to manage an individual desktop.
DesktopManager This interface provides a means to manage all the desktops used by a user.
MasterBar This interface provides access to the master bar information.
MimeManager This interface is responsible for managing the mime objects.
ThemeManager This object is responsible for managing the themes.
 

Class Summary
AppInfo This object represents the application information.
DesktopInfo This object contains th desktop information.
GadgetInfo This object represents application to be embedded in the desktop.
GadgetInfo.EmbeddedApp This class contains the embedded information.
LaunchInfo The object containing the information necessary to launch the application.
Menu This object defines a menu.
MenuItem This object represents a menu item.
MimeType The mime information about applications.
 

Exception Summary
DesktopException The exceptions that is thrown when there is an error with the desktop server.
DuplicateEntryException The duplicate entry exception
EntryNotFoundException This exception is thrown when the specified entry is not found.
